title: A Twist Of Lennon
description: Cynthia married John while he was still in art college, and shared the frenzy and stardom the Beatles created. It's all here, form the early days in German clubs, through the Ed Sullivan Show. A Hard Day;s Night, Sergeant Pepper's, The Maharishi - Cynthia Lennon lived the Beatle experience.
author: Cynthia Lennon
